titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1556
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1556

encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

div.tei:ab:
Text preserved in this squeeze:
1.w-nb(ṭ) 2.m | bny 3.ʿʾl | [...] 4.{m} | lḥy 5.ywm | šy 6.w-b-ʿly 7.ḏt | ḥmym
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.nbṭkrb | w-nbṭyfʿ | bn | 2.[qwmm | w-ḏʿb]m | bny [| ʿšrm |] 3.[ʿbd | yd]ʿʾl | [w-yṯʿʾmr | h=] 4.[qny | ḏt | ḥmym]{m} | lḥy[ʿṯt | w-ʿ=] 5.[mʾmr |] ywm | šy[m-hw | ydʿʾb] 6.[b-ʿly | ktlm |] w-b-ʿly [| mbny] 7.[byt |] ḏt | ḥmym [| b-ʿṯtr | w-b | ʾ=] 8.[lmqh | w-b | ḏt | ḥmym | w-b | ḏt | b=] 9.[ʿdn | w-b | smʿ | w-b | ydʿʾl | w-b] 10.[yṯʿʾmr | w-b | ydʿʾb | w-b | kt=] 11.[lm]

Text preserved in this squeeze:
1.and Nabaṭ 2.m, of the lineage 3.ʿʾīl [...] 4.{m} Laḥay 5.when [... ... ...] 6.and over 7.Dhāt-Ḥimāyim.
Restored full text of the inscription:
1.[Nabaṭkarib] and Nabaṭ[yafaʿ bin] 2.[Qawāmum and Dhaʿib]um, of the lineage [of ʿAshīrum,] 3.[the client of Yad]aʿʾīl [and Yithaʿʾamar, has dedi-] 4.[cated to Dhāt-Ḥimāyimu]{m} Laḥay[ʿathat and ʿA] 5.[mmīʾamar,] when [Yadaʿʾab] appoin[ted him] 6.[over Kutālum] and over [the construction of] 7.[the temple of] Dhāt-Ḥimāyim. [By ʿAthtar and by ʾĪ] 8.[lmuquh and by Dhāt-Ḥimāyim and by Dhāt-Ba] 9.[ʿdān and by Sāmiʿ and by Yadaʿʾīl and by] 10.[Yithaʿʾamar and by Yadaʿʾab and by Kutā=] 11.[lum].

Text preserved in this squeeze:
and Nabaṭ
m, of the lineage
ʿʾīl ...
m Laḥay
when ...
and over
Dhāt-Ḥimāyim.
Restored full text of the inscription:
Nabaṭkarib and Nabaṭyafaʿ bin
Qawāmum and Dhaʿibum, of the lineage of ʿAshīrum,
the client of Yadaʿʾīl and Yithaʿʾamar, has dedi-
cated to Dhāt-Ḥimāyimu m Laḥayʿathat and ʿA
mmīʾamar, when Yadaʿʾab appointed him
over Kutālum and over the construction of
the temple of Dhāt-Ḥimāyim. By ʿAthtar and by ʾĪ
lmuquh and by Dhāt-Ḥimāyim and by Dhāt-Ba
ʿdān and by Sāmiʿ and by Yadaʿʾīl and by
Yithaʿʾamar and by Yadaʿʾab and by Kutā=
lum.
